title: Child's elevated mental ill-health risk if mother treated for infection during pregnancy

title_detail.value: Child's elevated mental ill-health risk if mother treated for infection during pregnancy

summary: Risks for autism and depression are higher if one's mother was in hospital with an infection during pregnancy. This is shown by a major Swedish observational study of nearly 1.8 million children.

summary_detail.value: Risks for autism and depression are higher if one's mother was in hospital with an infection during pregnancy. This is shown by a major Swedish observational study of nearly 1.8 million children.
